items.title: Alien Angles
items.directions: Start the game by clicking the "Start" button below. You will be given an angle where an alien is floating. In order to save the alien, you must estimate the correct angle within 5 degrees. Use the slider bar to set the correct angle. When you are finished, click the "Check" button to check your accuracy.

item.question: There's an alien floating at 91
item.feedback: You got one!Hit the Next button to find another alien.
You missed him. Hit the Next button to find another alien.
